author: Katie Glueck
title: Joe Biden’s Appeal to the ‘Reasonable Republican Dad’ Vote
description: For some Democrats, a key part of the former vice president’s pitch is that their moderate friends and relatives like him, too.

author: Eric Lipton and Steve Eder
title: In Trying Times for President’s Business, It Turns Out Less Trump Is More
description: Office towers in New York and San Francisco — centers of political resistance — are offsetting revenue downturns in the president’s glitzier Trump-branded hotels.
content:
Doral, about seven miles from Miami International Airport, reflects the challenges the hotel business has faced, with even Mr. Trump acknowledging that his politics have driven away certain customers.
